# UIConfigurationTextAttributesTransformer

**Structure**

Defines a text transformation that can affect the visual appearance of a string.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UIConfigurationTextAttributesTransformer
```

## Overview

Use a transformer to affect how your attributed text appears on the UI. You provide a closure when initializing the transformer. Your closure accepts a container with the current text attributes and returns a container with the new text attributes.

```swift
let transformer = UIConfigurationTextAttributesTransformer { incoming in
    var outgoing = incoming
    outgoing.foregroundColor = UIColor.black
    outgoing.font = UIFont.boldSystemFont(ofSize: 20)
    return outgoing
}
```

## Creating a text attributes transformer

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new text attributes transformer.

## Defining a text transformation

- **transform**: A closure that defines the text transformation.

## Calling a text transformer

- **callAsFunction(_:)**: Calls the transform closure of the text attributes transformer.

## Configuring titles

- **title**: The text of the title label the button displays.
- **subtitle**: The text the subtitle label of the button displays.
- **attributedTitle**: The text and style attributes for the button’s title label.
- **attributedSubtitle**: The text and style attributes for the button’s subtitle label.
- **titleTextAttributesTransformer**: A structure to update the attributed title when the button state changes.
- **subtitleTextAttributesTransformer**: A structure to update the attributed subtitle when the button state changes.
- **titlePadding**: The distance between the title and subtitle labels.
- **titleAlignment**: The text alignment the button uses to lay out the title and subtitle.
- **UIButton.Configuration.TitleAlignment**: Specifies how to align a button’s title and subtitle.
- **titleLineBreakMode**: The line break mode the button uses to lay out the button’s title.
- **subtitleLineBreakMode**: The line break mode the button uses to lay out the button’s subtitle.
